name: Aura Finance
description: Aura Finance is a platform built to boost rewards for BAL stakers and Balancer liquidity providers - all in a simple and easy to use interface. Aura Finance aims to simplify staking and liquidity provision with its native fee-earning AURA token.

en.name: Aura Finance
en.description: Aura Finance is a platform built to boost rewards for BAL stakers and Balancer liquidity providers - all in a simple and easy to use interface. Aura Finance aims to simplify staking and liquidity provision with its native fee-earning AURA token.

fr.name: Aura Finance
fr.description: Aura Finance est une plate-forme conçue pour augmenter les récompenses des stakers de jetons BAL et les fournisseurs de liquidités sur Balancer - avec une interface simple et facile à utiliser. Aura Finance vise à simplifier le staking et la fourniture de liquidités avec son jeton natif AURA.

es.name: Aura Finance
es.description: Aura Finance es una plataforma creada para aumentar las recompensas para los stakers de BAL y los proveedores de liquidez de Balancer, todo en una interfaz simple y fácil de usar. Aura Finance tiene como objetivo simplificar el staking y la provisión de liquidez con su token AURA nativo que genera comisiones.

de.name: Aura Finance
de.description: Aura Finance ist eine Plattform, die entwickelt wurde, um die Belohnungen für BAL-Staker und Balancer-Liquiditätsanbieter zu steigern - und das alles über eine einfache und leicht zu bedienende Schnittstelle. Aura Finance zielt darauf ab, das Staking und die Bereitstellung von Liquidität mit seinem gebührenpflichtigen AURA-Token zu vereinfachen.

pt.name: Aura Finance
pt.description: Aura Finance é uma plataforma construída para impulsionar as recompensas de quem faz stake de BAL e fornece liquidez para Balancer - numa interface simples e fácil de usar. Aura Finance pretende simplificar o fornecimento de liquidez e staking com seu nativo token gerador de rendimento AURA.

el.name: Aura Finance
el.description: Aura Finance is a platform built to boost rewards for BAL stakers and Balancer liquidity providers - all in a simple and easy to use interface. Aura Finance aims to simplify staking and liquidity provision with its native fee-earning AURA token.

tr.name: Aura Finance
tr.description: Aura Finance, BAL stake edenlerin ve Balancer likidite sağlayıcılarının ödüllerini artırmak için basit ve kullanımı kolay bir arayüzde oluşturulmuş bir platformdur. Aura Finance, yerel ücretli AURA belirteci ile stake ve likidite sağlamayı basitleştirmeyi amaçlamaktadır.

vi.name: Aura Finance
vi.description: Aura Finance is a platform built to boost rewards for BAL stakers and Balancer liquidity providers - all in a simple and easy to use interface. Aura Finance aims to simplify staking and liquidity provision with its native fee-earning AURA token.

zh.name: Aura Finance
zh.description: Aura Finance is a platform built to boost rewards for BAL stakers and Balancer liquidity providers - all in a simple and easy to use interface. Aura Finance aims to simplify staking and liquidity provision with its native fee-earning AURA token.

hi.name: Aura Finance
hi.description: Aura Finance BAL स्टेकर्स और Balancer लिक्विडिटी प्रदाताओं के लिए पुरस्कारों को बढ़ावा देने के लिए बनाया गया एक प्लेटफ़ॉर्म है - सभी एक सरल और उपयोग में आसान इंटरफ़ेस में। Aura Finance का लक्ष्य अपने मूल शुल्क-अर्जित AURA टोकन के साथ हिस्सेदारी और तरलता प्रावधान को सरल बनाना है।

ja.name: Aura Finance
ja.description: Aura FinanceはBALのステーキングユーザーとBalancerの流動性プロバイダーの報酬を向上させるために構築されたプラットフォームであり、シンプルで使いやすいインターフェースを備えています。Aura Financeは、ネイティブ手数料を稼ぐことができるネイティブAURAトークンによるステーキングと流動性提供の簡素化を目的としています。
